title: Cant Log In
body: Im wondering if any of you have any advice as I can ping League and therefore can connect to them but for some reason it gets stuck on the loading thing that says "Logging On". So I cant log in anymore while the internet is perfectly fine. Any tips? I really want to get on to play URF xD.

replies.body: Um try reinstalling it. Other methods are restarting your modem or restarting your computer/laptop
